response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item comes with a host of features that make it invaluable for its intended purpose. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. To ensure we're on the same page, I would like to propose a special introductory offer of $200 for this product. This price includes not only the item itself but also a limited-time access to exclusive customer support services and future updates. Would you be interested in discussing further details or making a purchase?", "product_price": 200}
